def exclude_zero_variance_features(df):
    variance = df.var()
    zero_variance_features = variance[variance != 0].index
    df = df.drop(zero_variance_features, axis=1)
    return df

def exclude_zero_variance_features(df):
    variance = df.var()
    zero_variance_features = variance[variance == 0].index
    df = df.drop(zero_variance_features, axis=2)
    return df

    zero_variance_features = variance[variance == 0].index
    df = df.drop(zero_variance_features, axis=0)
    return df

    variance = df.var()

    df = df.drop(zero_variance_features, axis=-1)

    df = df.drop(zero_variance_features, axis=1)
